		<meta charset="utf-8">
		<title>spartan/ui - Sheet</title>
		<base href="/">
		<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
		<link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="/assets/spartan.svg">
		<script>
			let hasBody = !!document && !!document.body;
			if (localStorage.theme !== 'default' && hasBody) {
				document.body.classList.add('theme-' + localStorage.theme);
			}

			let hasDocument = !!document && !!document.documentElement;
			let systemDarkMode = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches;
			if (localStorage.darkMode === 'dark' && hasDocument) {
				document.documentElement.classList.add('dark');
			} else if (localStorage.darkMode === 'light' && hasDocument) {
				document.documentElement.classList.remove('dark');
				localStorage.setItem('darkMode', 'light');
			} else if (systemDarkMode && hasDocument) {
				localStorage.setItem('darkMode', 'system');
				document.documentElement.classList.add('dark');
			} else if (hasDocument) {
				document.documentElement.classList.remove('dark');
			}

			if (localStorage.layout) {
				document.documentElement.classList.add('layout-' + localStorage.layout);
			}
			if (window.navigator.userAgent.toUpperCase().includes('MAC')) {
				document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--is-mac', 'true');
			}
		</script>

full.html:
<!DOCTYPE html><html class="h-full scroll-smooth" lang="en"><head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">
		<title>spartan/ui - Sheet</title>
		<base href="/">
		<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
		<link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="/assets/spartan.svg">
		<script>
			let hasBody = !!document && !!document.body;
			if (localStorage.theme !== 'default' && hasBody) {
				document.body.classList.add('theme-' + localStorage.theme);
			}

			let hasDocument = !!document && !!document.documentElement;
			let systemDarkMode = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches;
			if (localStorage.darkMode === 'dark' && hasDocument) {
				document.documentElement.classList.add('dark');
			} else if (localStorage.darkMode === 'light' && hasDocument) {
				document.documentElement.classList.remove('dark');
				localStorage.setItem('darkMode', 'light');
			} else if (systemDarkMode && hasDocument) {
				localStorage.setItem('darkMode', 'system');
				document.documentElement.classList.add('dark');
			} else if (hasDocument) {
				document.documentElement.classList.remove('dark');
			}

			if (localStorage.layout) {
				document.documentElement.classList.add('layout-' + localStorage.layout);
			}
			if (window.navigator.userAgent.toUpperCase().includes('MAC')) {
				document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--is-mac', 'true');
			}
		</script>
